description:
After his plan falls apart, Law must fight for his life against two powerful opponents. Elsewhere, Sanji bids a touching goodbye to his special lady friend, and Luffy tangles with Brutal Bull!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La Terre et les Cieux ébranlés. La puissance de l’Amiral Fujitora !
Shaking Heaven and Earth! Admiral Fujitora`s Power!
Tenchi Yurugasu! Taishou Fujitora no Jitsuryoku
Небо и земля дрожат! Истинная сила адмирала Фудзитора
تهز السماء والأرض! قوّة الأميرال فوجيتورا!
天地ゆるがす! 大将藤虎の実力
